data.name: Adularia of the Moonlit Water
data.desc: If a face-up card is in your Spell & Trap Zone, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Adularia of the Moonlit Water" once per turn this way. Gains 600 ATK/DEF for each face-up Spell/Trap on the field. You can send 2 face-up cards from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY; send 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your Deck to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Adularia of the Moonlit Water" once per turn.
